messages.message:
@Varun Jain / @mfichman Did we by chance update the credits for the se's? I am still out as others on the team

cc: @Gwen
On it, Matt was busy fixing billing bugs yesterday :slightly_smiling_face: will confirm as soon as it is done!
Anything specific you can’t do in UAT environment? Good for us to know
UAT has been stable, but when it comes to customer demos, etc. i like to show the prod url for my session this afternoon.
@joshbronko Credits on the way for you. @Varun Jain I'm going to send out an email to the sales folks.
@mfichman if i could quickly get some too please
We will add for all the SEs!

Sent an email; copying it here:

> The process for adding credits is currently manual, but I'm building a way to add credits to accounts into the Admin app.
> 
> In the meantime, if you *urgently* need credits for a customer demo (or any other reason, really) please reach out to me directly and I will manually add credits on a case-by-case basis.
> 
> For everyone else: please use aihub.uat.instabase.com (http://aihub.uat.instabase.com) if possible, and I'll add credits to your account once the Admin app is updated!
@Gwen, @joshbronko -- raised credit limits for you (50K, per Varun's request)

FYI: The script I ran for @joshbronko, @Gwen, Anant and Varun *increases the total credit limit to 50K,* rather than adding 50K credits. In @joshbronko’s case:

• Initial credit limit was 1000 credits (free trial credits)
• He used 1006 (slight overshoot -- this is expected)
• I raised the credit limit to 50K credits
• Resulting credit _balance_ is credit limit - credit usage = 50K - 1006 = 48994.
Lmk if you have questions about this.
